    • isGameSaved

      public boolean isGameSaved()
      Checks whether the game has been saved or not. This is done by checking if the JSON that contains the state of the game exists.
      Returns:
      true if the game has been saved, false otherwise

    • loadLastGame

      public void loadLastGame() throws IOException
      Loads the game saved in the JSON file.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file does not exist

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect(String username)
      Adds a player to the list of disconnected players
      Parameters:
      username - the identifier of the disconnected player

    • setNumberOfPlayers

      public void setNumberOfPlayers(int numberOfPlayers)

    • getExtraPlayers

      public List<String> getExtraPlayers()
      Return the list of players' nicknames that cannot play because there are already 4 players in the room.
      Returns:
      the list of players' nicknames that cannot play

    • removePlayers

      public void removePlayers(List<String> playersToRemove)

    • addClient

      public void addClient(String username, ClientCommunicationInterface client)
      Method to add a player to the game
      Parameters:
      username - is the nickname of the player
      client - is the client associated to the player

    • addClient

      public void addClient(String username, SocketClientHandler client)
      Method to add a player to the game
      Parameters:
      username - the nickname of the player
      client - the client associated to the player

    • getRmiClients

      public HashMap<String,ClientCommunicationInterface> getRmiClients()
      Returns:
      hashmap of RMI clients

    • getTcpClients

      public HashMap<String,SocketClientHandler> getTcpClients()
      Returns:
      hashmap of TCP clients

    • checkUsername

      public int checkUsername(String username)
      Parameters:
      username - the username chosen by the player
      Returns:
      a number representing the availability of the username
      • 1: the username is available
      • 0: the username is already taken
      • -1: the username was disconnectedPlayers
      • -2: the username has reconnected after the server went down

    • getPositionByUsername

      public int getPositionByUsername(String username)
      Return the position of the player in the list of players. If the player is not present in the list, it returns -1. The list is ordered by the order of the players' turns.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player
      Returns:
      the position of the player in the list of players, or -1 if the player is not in the list

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String username, boolean firstGame)
      Saves a player in the list of players.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player
      firstGame - true if it's the first game of the player

    • startRoom

      public void startRoom()
      Creates a new room and adds the player to it if it doesn't exist, otherwise adds the player to the existing room. If the room didn't exist, the player is the first player of the game.

    • checkRoom

      public int checkRoom()
      Starts the game if it's possible.
      Returns:
      a number representing the status of the room:
      • 1: the room is full and the game can start
      • 0: the maximum number of players is not set
      • -1: the room is full and there are too many players

    • isGameStarted

      public boolean isGameStarted()
      Returns:
      true if the game has already started, false otherwise.

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public String getCurrentPlayer()
      Returns:
      the username of the current player

    • getBookshelves

      public HashMap<String,Bookshelf> getBookshelves()
      Returns:
      a map of the bookshelves and the players who own them

    • checkNumPlayer

      public String checkNumPlayer(int numPlayer)
      Checks if the number of players is valid (between 2 and 4).
      Parameters:
      numPlayer - the number of players inserted by the first user
      Returns:
      "ok" if the number of players is valid, "retry" otherwise

    • getPersonalGoalCard

      public int getPersonalGoalCard(int index)

    • getCommonGoals

      public List<CommonGoal> getCommonGoals()

    • refill

      public boolean refill()
      Refills the board if there are no more items to pick and if the item bag is not empty.
      Returns:
      true if the board has been refilled, false otherwise

    • getBoard

      public Board getBoard()
      Returns the board and refills it if it's necessary.
      Returns:
      the board

    • checkGameStatus

      public int checkGameStatus()
      this method checks if the game is ended or not or if it's the last round
      Returns:
      -1,0 or 1:
      • -1: the game has ended
      • 0: it's the last round
      • 1: the game is not ended and it's not the last round

    • checkPick

      public String checkPick(List<Integer> move)
      Checks if a pick is valid.
      Parameters:
      move - the representation of the pick
      Returns:
      "ok" if the pick is valid, "no" otherwise

    • changeTurn

      public void changeTurn()
      Changes the turn in the model or ends the game.

    • setWinner

      public void setWinner()
      Sets the winner and the losers of the game.

    • getLosers

      public HashMap<String,Integer> getLosers()
      Returns:
      the map between the losers and their final points

    • getWinners

      public HashMap<String,Integer> getWinners()
      Returns:
      the map between the winners and their final points

    • getPicked

      public List<Item> getPicked(List<Integer> picked)
      Picks the items from the board and returns them.
      Parameters:
      picked - the representation of the pick
      Returns:
      the list of picked items

    • rearrangePicked

      public void rearrangePicked(List<Integer> sort)
      Rearranges the picked items according to the order given by the player.
      Parameters:
      sort - the list of indexes of the items in the order given by the player

    • checkInsert

      public int checkInsert(int column)
      this method checks if the player can insert the picked items in the bookshelf
      Parameters:
      column - the column where the player wants to insert the picked items
      Returns:
      -1,0 or 1:
      • -1: the player can't insert the picked items in the bookshelf because there are not enough free cells
      • 0: the player can't insert the picked items in the bookshelf because the column is not valid
      • 1: the player can insert the picked items in the bookshelf

    • saveGame

      public void saveGame()

    • createCoordinateList

      public List<Coordinates> createCoordinateList(List<Integer> integers)

    • isFirst

      public boolean isFirst()
      Returns:
      true if the player is the first player, false otherwise

    • getTopOfScoring

      public List<Integer> getTopOfScoring()
      Returns:
      the top scoring list of each common goal

    • allPoints

      public List<Integer> allPoints(int position)
      Parameters:
      position - the position of the player
      Returns:
      the list of the points of the player

    • getFirstPlayer

      public String getFirstPlayer()
      Returns:
      the username of the first player

    • resetSavedGame

      public void resetSavedGame()
      Resets information about the game on the server. Used when a game ends.

    • getInitialPoints

      public HashMap<String,List<Integer>> getInitialPoints()
      Method used to get the initial points of the players, 0 for each field
      • first element(index 0):the points of the personal goal
      • second element(index 1):the points of the common goal/s
      • third element(index 2):the points of the bookshelf
      • fourth element(index 3):the total of all points
      Returns:
      a map with the initial points of the players
      See Also:
      • GameModel.getAllPoints(Player)

    • getAllCurrentPoints

      public HashMap<String,List<Integer>> getAllCurrentPoints()
      Method used to get the current points of the players, 0 for each field
      • first element(index 0):the points of the personal goal
      • second element(index 1):the points of the common goal/s
      • third element(index 2):the points of the bookshelf
      • fourth element(index 3):the total of all points
      Returns:
      a map with the initial points of the players
      See Also:
      • GameModel.getAllPoints(Player)

    • addCheckThread

      public void addCheckThread(Thread checkThread)
